description: Dirichlet convolution of b_n=n with b_n with b_n.
formula: a(n) = Sum{k*l*m = n} k*l*m, for positive integer k, l, m. This equals one sixth of the same sum over all integers. - _Ralf Stephan_, May 06 2005Dirichlet g.f.: zeta^3(x-1)Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^e * (e+2 choose 2) . _Mitch Harris_ Jun 27, 2005.a(n) = n*A007425(n). Dirichlet convolution of A000027 by A038040. - R. J. Mathar, Mar 30 2011
author: _Erich Friedman_
